definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: There will be floating hotels in the center of the capital along Moskva river embankments next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年在莫斯科市中心的莫斯科河上将出现浮动酒店。

sentences.english: Thanks to unknown military merits young Kim was just promoted to four-star general.
sentences.chinese: 仗着无人知晓的军功，小金刚刚被晋升为四星上将。

sentences.english: General Anatol Gogal: On the contrary, Admiral. Where would Russian research be without it?
sentences.chinese: 相反地，上将，没有了它俄国到那儿去研究呢？

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards admiral harwood learnt that the ship was weighing anchor.
sentences.chinese: 嗣后不久，哈伍德海军上将获悉“施佩”号在起锚了。

sentences.english: The first female admiral in the U.S. navy.
sentences.chinese: 美国海军第一个女上将。

sentences.english: Paper and board . characteristics of drawing paper.
sentences.chinese: 在白色绘图纸上将编稿晒成蓝图。

sentences.english: A new bridge will be built over the river.
Like Admiral Mullen, Mr. Crowley called on China to act.
sentences.chinese: 同穆伦上将一样，克劳利也呼吁中国行动起来。

sentences.english: We will provide flip-chart paper and magic markers.
sentences.chinese: 课上将提供演示用活页纸和魔术笔。

sentences.english: Portraits of the two generals hang behind Gates’s Pentagon desk.
sentences.chinese: 在盖茨的办公桌之后，高悬着这两位五星上将的画像。

sentences.english: During the construction phase of its existence, the whole operation was under the command of Admiral Griff.
sentences.chinese: 在其建造阶段，整项工程都由格里夫上将指挥。

sentences.english: The admiral flipped the chart and showed a close-up of the submarine.
sentences.chinese: 海军上将翻动图样，展示一幅这艘潜艇的近照。

sentences.english: In 50 years, perhaps there will be no more cormorant fishermen in the world.
sentences.chinese: 年以后，或许世界上将不再有鸬鹚渔民了。

sentences.english: Five period also published and will be Tan Xilin Yang Zhicheng PLA will.
sentences.chinese: 五期中还出过解放军上将杨至成和中将谭希林。

sentences.english: The ruined portion of the Pentagon was rebuilt and reoccupied within a year.
sentences.chinese: 五角大厦的原址上将会重建并会在一年内落成。

sentences.english: And more such icons are expected to come out of this summer's Games.
sentences.chinese: 预计在今年夏天的奥运会上将出现更多这类偶像人物。

definition: high ranking officer in Chinese army/colonel
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
junior ranking officer in Chinese army/major/lieutenant commander
